/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, add a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. Cars parked along the side of the road hint at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy clouds that add a touch of whimsy to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
